turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order two grande Pike's Place coffees with cream and sugar

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the coffees ordered from the Starbucks at Lakeside Mall on Hall Road?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I want it from the Starbucks in Lakeside Mall.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you need room for cream in your cups?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, I'd like room for cream in one cup but not the other.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How many packets of sugar would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want four packets of sugar.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the sugar to be added to the cups of coffee or served spearately?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You can add the sugar into the cups before serving.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: How much cream do you want in your coffee?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Add sufficient cream in one cup but leave the other cup black.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What time do you want it delivered to you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like it delivered in the next 40 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any cookies along with it?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please send me two oatmeal raisin cookies from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the cookies packed in separate bags?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, you can pack both cookies together in one brown bag.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want the cookies to be warmed up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please warm the cookies.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want cup holders sent with the coffees?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, that cup holders would be great, thanks!
